item.title: Music Tracks
item.description: Music tracks available for download Instrumental tracks for the songs are linked below. Make sure you’re practicing with these tracks as the timing can be tricky! Bitch of Living Creepy Old Guy Big Spender Sexy

item.title: Set List Preview
item.description: Trying to pick out the perfect audition song for our cabaret? Here is a preview playlist of songs we have chosen for the show and are looking to cast. Feel free to pick something from this list, or bring something of your own! Weâ€™re looking for performers to cast into prechosen group numbers. We will likely add a handful more to this list, inspired by auditions. Spotify Cabaret Playlist

item.title: Rehearsal Schedule
item.description: Our rehearsals are likely going to be on Mondays and Thursdays from 6:30-9:30 and Saturday afternoons. We will organize our rehearsals around Heather’s, to allow performers to do both. First rehearsal will be May 26th at 6:30PM. Stay tuned for more!
